e: ￹`Pakayni~ `kita~ `a~ `romakat~.￺We go this way.￻我們經由這條路走
￹`Pakayni~ `i~ `patay~ `nira~ `a~ `ma~`hepol~ `ko~ `raraw~.￺Through His deathsins are forgiven.￻藉著 (通過) 他的死，使我們的罪得赦免
￹`Paka~`ynien~ `toya~ `tamdaw~ `ko~ `pi~`pasowal~.￺Use (as an instrument) that man to speak (to someone).￻透過那個人，來說這件事
d.f: ￹￺through * by way of￻經過，通過，經由，當作，作為，藉著

e: ￹`Awaay~ `ko~ `sowal~ `nira~ `to~ `paka~`yniay~ `tonini~ `a~ `demak~.￺He didn't say anything about this matter.￻他沒有交待有關這件事情
d.f: ￹￺concerning * with reference to￻關於，參照如下
